Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: yanfeb15
Reviews.Content: I've gotten many compliments on this phone. People have told me they can tell it's not American and get excited when I show them the dual camera feature.  I'm glad I bought it with warranty and unlocked (glad I read about it) or else I'd have serious problems.  I am using T-Mobile service with this phone and since it's only a prepaid account and with minimal services, I don't get to use every feature (such as video call) that I could get if I had a contract.  I have trouble sending picture messages, but I have yet to find out if it's because of my service or if I had to change the settings in order to get them. Nevertheless, it's a great phone. It's colorful, simple, and nice to have.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band unlocked GSM 900/1800/1900MHz, 3.5G UMTS (2100MHz).
3MP Built-In Camera; FM Radio; Bluetooth; E-Mail; SMS / EMS / MMS; External Memory MicroSD up to 8GB.
The sweetest design; Instant Silence; Captivating LED lights; Lovable Graphics and Built-In Game.
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG GD580 Unlocked GSM Tri-Band Cell Phone with 3MP Camera, E-mail, FM Radio, Micro SD card and Bluetooth --International Version with Warranty (Blue)
